pages.title: Legacy Fire & Safety LLC
pages.markdown_fit:
Legacy Fire & Safety is local family owned and operated fire protection service company providing over 20 years of experience in the industry for your fire protection needs and services. We provide service for all your fire protection requirements including fire alarm systems, fire sprinkler systems, back-flow preventers, pre-engineered kitchen systems, clean agent systems, and portable fire extinguishers. Since 2008 Legacy Fire has earned the trust of local businesses across Colorado through our devotion to customer service and our mindfulness to safety. 
Fill out a quote form to speak with a fire protection specialist
The importance of fire protection can never be overstated. Here at Legacy Fire & Safety we never compromise quality for time. Every customers complete satisfaction is our goal it always has and always will be. We can guarantee you will see the Legacy difference.
I am the owner and Head Technician of Legacy Fire & Safety. I have been in the fire protection industry since 2000 working for local Colorado companies until 2008 when I decided to start Legacy Fire & Safety. The goal was to provide the best possible fire protection at the best rate with the customer in mind.

pages.markdown_fit:
Fire alarms are a critical in fire prevention. Legacy Fire & Safety offers installation, inspection, design, service and repair of all fire alarm systems. These services include: flame detection, heat detection, smoke detection, air sampling, cable and digital sensor linear detection. Legacy Fire & Safety can customize any system to meet individualized fire detection needs. 
Not sure if your fire protection systems are working properly? Legacy Fire & Safety offers in-depth inspections to ensure everything is working accurately. Along with inspections Legacy Fire & Safety provides monitoring through AES Corporation’s Intellinet subscribers to provide the best monitoring service for your business. 
Legacy Fire & Safety is proud to offer testing and inspection services for cooking and restaurant cooking systems, which include wet and dry hood systems. All of our testing and inspections are in accordance with the 
“Fire sprinklers buys time. Time buys life.” (NFSA) A proper fire sprinkler system can not be emphasized enough. Legacy Fire & Safety offers installation, inspection, design, service and repair of all fire sprinkler systems. Legacy Fire & Safety upholds all NFPA 13 standards as well as your local jurisdictions. 
Fire extinguishers are an essential device in protecting your business. Legacy Fire & Safety will guarantee you have the right extinguisher as well as proper inspection and maintenance to keep them working properly. 
Have an IT room that needs protection? Clean agent systems minimize damage with no-clean up and fast restoration service. Legacy Fire & Safety provides maintenance and installation of clean agent systems.
Looking for a quote on our services? Fill out the form below.
